DOC.brief_summary: This study is determine the effects of dietary calcium and phytate on zinc absorption.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Calcium and Phytate on Zinc Absorption
DOC.detailed_description: Zinc absorption is tested from 2 days of consuming each of four diets with zinc-65 isotope, followed by retention monitoring in a whole body scintillation counter for 4 weeks. All four 4 experimental diets are tested with each subject, in randomized order, for a total of 16 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Average weight for height Medications other than birth control pills or hormone replacement therapy, Pregnancy within last 6 months
